attributes.action: write to Michel Platini, President of UEFA to request that the red card incorrectly issued to the Manchester United player Darren Fletcher be rescinded thereby allowing him to be available for selection for the Champions League Final on May 27th
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I request that Gordon Brown write to Michel Platini, President of UEFA, to request that the red card incorrectly issued to the Manchester United player Darren Fletcher be rescinded thereby allowing him to be available for selection for the Champions League Final on May 27th.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
